name: Test +X points north
description: Test that sensor reports ~0 μT along the Y axis when +X axis points North. Before the test, rotate device 360 degrees around each axis and then point its +X axis to magnetic North.

name: Test +Y points north
description: Test that sensor reports ~0 μT along the X axis when +Y axis points North. Before the test, rotate device 360 degrees around each axis and then point its +Y axis to magnetic North.
